=== Generic Chains E2E Tests ===

--- Test 1: Basic Generic Chain ---
original: 42
wrapped.value: 42
unwrapped: 42
final: 42

--- Test 2: Pair Chain ---
pair.first: 100
pair.second: hello
key: 100
value: hello

--- Test 3: Triple Chain ---
triple.a (int): 10
triple.b (long): 9999999999
triple.c (string): test

--- Test 4: Nested Containers ---
nested.value.value: 50
inner.value: 50
value: 50

--- Test 5: Deep Container ---
deep.level1.value.value: 77
level2.value: 77
value: 77

--- Test 6: Map Container ---
intContainer.value: 25
longContainer.value: 25000000

--- Test 7: Box Class ---
intBox.get(): 30
stringBox.get(): Value: 30

--- Test 8: FlatMap Box ---
intBox.get(): 5
longBox.get(): 10000000000

--- Test 9: Array of Generics ---
containers[0].value: 1
containers[1].value: 2
containers[2].value: 3
values: [1, 2, 3]

--- Test 10: Chained Method Calls ---
chained result: Result: 1000

=== All Generic Chain Tests Completed ===
